price: Ya ce: "Ita ce ta nẽme ni a kaina."Kuma wani mai shaida daga mutãnenta ya bãyar da shaida: *"Idan rigarsa ta kasance an tsage ta daga gaba, to, tã yi gaskiya, kuma shĩ ne daga maƙaryata."
arabic: قَالَ هِيَ رَٰوَدَتۡنِي عَن نَّفۡسِيۚ وَشَهِدَ شَاهِدٞ مِّنۡ أَهۡلِهَآ إِن كَانَ قَمِيصُهُۥ قُدَّ مِن قُبُلٖ فَصَدَقَتۡ وَهُوَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ
footnotes: * Bãyar da shaida a kan al'ãda, mai bãyar da shaidar yanã gabãtar da ita da magana a kan Yusufu, dõmin a ganinsa tuhuma a kanta, tã fi karfi, kuma zumuntarsa da ita ba ta ɗauke shi ba ga karkatar da magana dõmin ya taimake ta.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla hiya rāwadatnī ʿan nafsī washahida shāhidun min ahlihā in kāna qamīṣuhu qudda min qubulin faṣadaqat wahuwa mina al-kādhibīna
translations: then she has spoken the truth
